name: BEST WESTERN Hotel Smokies Park

reviews.text: We stayed at Smokies Park for two nights in February 2009. Our friends were getting married nearby and holding their reception at Smokies.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found our room to be comfortable, with a huge bed. Staff were friendly and helpful - I called Reception to ask for an iron and it arrived within minutes.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay

likes.liked: — Friendliness and efficiency of duty manager when requesting change of suite

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for a family wedding recently.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, shame about some of the staff!!!

reviews.text: On arrival we were greeted by a very friendly, polite hotel receptionist who found our booking quicky and assinged us to our room which we were very thankful for after a long journey. It is a shame though that no offer was made to help my husband with our luggage, especially when we were staying in an executive room that had no lift access that had been suggested because we had our own travel cot and bed for our children.
reviews.title: Lovely room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Why there are no lifts to the executive rooms, when there are lifts to the others, is beyond me, but thankfully the stairs were not excessive nor steep. And the saving grace is that being in the attic, the rooms were extremely quiet.
reviews.title: Possibly the quietest hotel I've ever stayed in.

reviews.text: Our room was clean and relatively spacious and provided plenty of space for our travel cot, travel bed and luggage. It wasn't as big as the website suggested and only had one armchair, however it was sufficient for our needs and the lack of furniture worked to our advantage, so i won't niggle.
reviews.title: Very good hotel with a good restaurant with things that go bump in the night (not ghosts just the radiator!)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ordered room service shortly after arrival and were very surprised with the quantity and quality of the food. It was most definitley home made and very tasty indeed. A shame that no one came to collect the tray outside our room for the next 24 hours, until we politely asked them to remove it.
reviews.title: Really good value, enjoyed stay

description: Located near Manchester on the A627, between Oldham and Ashton-under-Lyne, with Manchester City Centre and Manchester Airport only a short drive away. Each of the delightfully furnished and spacious en-suite bedrooms are complete with 32" Flatscreen Freeview TVs, direct dial telephone and Free Wi-fi, hairdryer, garment press and tea and coffee making facilities, Free Parking and all the facilities you would expect from a modern, comfortable hotel.
